meanings.definition: A small piece of bread, often used for breading or as a garnish.
meanings.sent1: I sprinkled some breadcrumbs on top of the casserole before baking it.
meanings.sent2: The chef added a breadcrumb to the soup for extra texture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel left a trail of breadcrumbs leading to its hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter left a breadcrumb trail of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The breadcrumb on the cupcake added a delightful crunch.

meanings.definition: A trail of navigation links on a website, typically used for easy backtracking.
meanings.sent1: I followed the breadcrumbs at the top of the webpage to go back to the homepage.
meanings.sent2: The website's breadcrumb made it simple to navigate between different sections.
meanings.sent3: The breadcrumb on the website was like a helpful guide showing the way.
meanings.sent4: She followed the breadcrumb trail of links to find her way back to the main page.
meanings.sent5: The breadcrumb navigation bar was a lifesaver when I got lost on the site.
